website_summaries.verdict: Protect your ride-on garden tractor or mower from the elements with a water resistant cover with UV protection and other durable properties.
pros: Woven 600D polyester fabric is rip-resistant and provides heavy-duty coverage
Protects from the sun with UV resistant coating
Polyurethane coating on the inside layer of fabric and seams provides waterproofing
Ventilation from 2 air vents helps prevent condensation
Gathered elastic corners help keep cover in place
cons: May absorb rather than repel water
Large in size for some riding mowers

customer_reviews.title: Best Cover Ever
customer_reviews.text: After a mild rainstorm tore an earlier cover to pieces I went searching for a good quality, reasonably priced, lawn tractor cover. Family Accessories cover is the best I've ever seen or used. This cover has endured a moderately close hurricane and the attendant thunderstorms like a soldier. Heavy canvas like material. Emblem on front so I know which way to put it on without fumbling. Sewn in air vents. Generous sizing so no tugging or struggling to make it fit. This is the best cover ever! Don't waste your money on the others.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Al

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of size
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for the mower. Nice ,but guaranteed to blow off in the storm when you need it most.
customer_reviews.author: walter scherbarth

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fits well, and stays on.
customer_reviews.text: It's of very high quality, and completely covers my tractor (a Craftsman with a 46" deck). The vents on the side should help with condensation. We had severe winds the day that I got it - winds so bad that they launched my gazebo across the yard - but this cover stayed on the tractor. That's a testament to the quality of the elastic used on the bottom, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Furious

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality material, and price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this lawn mower cover, and was glad that I ordered the size medium.. Just a little bit extra size, but better than not enough! I was able to easily cover both sides of the deck, and around all 4 tires. The elastic edges are great, especially for when the winds come up, it will not get blown off, as all my other tarps have done. I like the FAMILY emblem looks good on the front, and the cover is an asset to my mower!!! LOVE IT... Accidently hit 4 stars, and meant to hit 5, if I could, I'd give it a 10....
customer_reviews.author: Tonia M. Palmero

customer_reviews.title: Great first impressions!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Family Accessories Waterproof Riding Lawnmower Cover for my zero turn riding mower. It is about three or four times thicker and more substantial than the one it replaced. It fits my John Deere Z717a 48" ZTR very well. It is not "taut" though, so water collects in the depression between the seat and the front weight bar. (I may store my old exercise ball under the cover to prevent the water buildup:) Perhaps putting elastic all the way around the bottom seam, instead of just on the front and rear, could tighten it up a bit. In any case, so far it is a great cover.
customer_reviews.author: Springlakedave

customer_reviews.title: These people know what HEAVY DUTY means.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's huge. It's waterproof. It has plenty of elastic around the bottom and it is HEAVY DUTY. It reminds me a lot of military SPEC material and not just the color. The last (less expensive) one that I got was too tight, water resistant at best, and died of sun rot in about a year. I'll be shocked if this one doesn't last at least 5 years and, no, it wasn't anywhere near 5X more expensive. If you have a nice lawn tractor that you want to keep nice but don't have a garage stall or shed for it, this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Gnomie

customer_reviews.title: but this one fits fine. Like the fact that it cover everything (including ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large for my John Deere D140. May have been able to get away with the smaller one, but this one fits fine. Like the fact that it cover everything (including tires). Seems to be of good material. Now worries with the weather anymore and needed something as the tratro will be parked outside until I get a chance to build it a home. Like the vents. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Austex Egger

customer_reviews.title: Fits over the bagger
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about it is that it not onlycovers my new JD S240 riding mower completely but also the bagger! I bought a Medium hoping it might, and it does! It's a heavy water proof material and is kind of an olive green in color, should last for years to come. The lawn mower is stored in a three sided open garden shed and although it isn't out in the weather the cover should help keep it clean. The logo helps me to know which is the front and helps me put it on correctly! The elastic around the front and rear hold it down and keeps it in place. Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Cirrus1

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell in regards to long term but I am pleased with the construction
customer_reviews.text: The cover is well made. Time will tell in regards to long term but I am pleased with the construction. Is plenty big enough to fit over my 42 inch cub cadet riding mower. I do recommend the cover.
customer_reviews.author: William Hornsey

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my new John Deere d130. It fits it perfect even with the brush guard on the front. It feels like a nice canvas cover not the plasticky nylon that dry rots.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Schnagl

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Its very well made and does exactly what it promises. We had hard rain for three days after I received it and it was dry and clean. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it's "one-size-fits-all" and it is way too big for my riding mower. I'm updating my review because the seller reached out to me and made arrangements for me to get the smaller size cover which fits my riding mower much better.
customer_reviews.author: mldlylt

customer_reviews.title: seems great BUT~~~~~~ see update
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, finally got some rain, seems like a great product! UPDATE~ when I lifted the cover off the mower today, it was soaked! condensation I presume, since it only rained but a few days ago, and has been dry ever since, so that will only produce rust eventually... not quite sure what to do? I guess it's a great cover for the days it rains, to keep a lot of rain out of the mechanics of it, but I won't keep a cover on it..
customer_reviews.author: dollmaker

customer_reviews.title: Very large cover, buy 1 size smaller than you think you need.
customer_reviews.text: 3/5 stars. Fabric appears to be of good quality and it has vents which is a plus. I returned due to it being much larger than described. Purchased for a husqvarna riding mower with a 46" deck. This cover engulfed the mower. Completely covered the wheels and the deck. And there was a lot of slack left over which resulted in it ballooning. I cannot attest to durability or weather proofing but it does appear it would do well in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: 0311 D.

customer_reviews.title: The Medium Size Fits my Yard Tractor -- will likely fit yours, too!
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits over my Craftsman Yard Tractor (wheels and all - w/ 48" deck) with room to spare. Was expecting it to be a bit thicker, but still anticipate that it will hold up well. Vents are a nice feature. The cover it replaced was a lighter-weight cover from the local "TS" store -- that one only lasted a season or two before it faded, cracked, and tears developed. I'll revisit this review in a year or two and provide an update on the durability of this seemingly capable replacement. TIP: The logo indicates the front side of the cover
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG F

customer_reviews.title: High quality waterproof lawnmower cover at low price
customer_reviews.text: The lawnmower cover is very high quality & waterproof. It had 2 layers to it. It is very durable. I got it caught on screen door & I thought it had torn for sure but no tear. Very durable it is waterproof because it rained all night & lawnmower is dry & cover stayed on It wa sold by family assceroies & was shipped fast & packaged great. They even emailed me several times about order & drlivry & to make sure everything was good. Very friendly & professional people. The cover was much better quality & workmanship than I expected. Easy to put on with front marked & logo on front of cover. Great lawnmower cover at low price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Bir

customer_reviews.title: THIS is water protection
customer_reviews.text: I got another brand last year and it immediately discolored. Always water inside after rain. Stopped the downpour ON the mower but did nothing to really keep the mower very dry. THIS cover though - there's NOTHING getting through. THis thing IS waterproof. Feels much more solid - almost rubberized. Not sure how they actually manufacture these things, but really wish I had bought this one first. We'll see about the durability, but it FEELS like I will get a few years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium but it was too small for my Husqvarna with 42 in. deck w/ two bag leaf bagger. I returned it and ordered the large one and had it the next day. That is amazing customer service. The large one fits great. The medium would have fit the mower fine if not for the leaf catcher. The bag appears to be very good quality and should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: best tractor cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these covers that I bought here. this is a replacement for the first one that lasted for ten years. These are very big on my CUB CADET lawn tractor but it reaches to ground protecting the entire tractor, The tires are also covered and the elastic border tucks up under the tires which holds the cover down even in a hurricane. I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: A Great Mower cover!
customer_reviews.text: To repeat what I said in the headline, It's a Great Mower cover. The seller was Family Accessories and the order was fulfilled by Amazon. The order came early and compared to other covers I've seen this one I really like! It's made with heavy duty materiel. I put it on a Troy-Bilt riding mower and it fit's the whole mower. It's price is good for mower covers. The product info on Amazon is correct! It come's with a 12 month warranty which I like. My last cover lasted 3 years and this one is a better made cover. If you need a cover to protect your mower? I say this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: mac johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable cover
customer_reviews.text: There are many different covers on the internet, but I am glad I chose this one. It is made of very high quality and fits my 42 inch Husky riding mower almost perfectly, securely wrapping itself around the tires, deck and seat. It sure beats covering it with a regular tarp which was always coming loose in the wind. A nice storage bag is included with it. Delivery was FAST, arriving in 2 days. I wish I had bought this cover when I first got the mower, about 7 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McKee

customer_reviews.title: It is Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a waterproof lawn tractor cover for awhile. I bought one from Home Depot that was surpose to be waterproof but wasn’t. I read the review for this one and a few people said it wasn’t waterproof. I live in the PNW and had to wait for it to rain since it was summer when I got the cover. So one day we had a slight rain and when I check to see if the cover worked, at first glance I was disappointed the cover was wet on the inside. When I did a thorough check it was just condensation. This product is worth it and it arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Renee B

customer_reviews.title: but that's not a bad thing. Easy to get on and covers the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my John Deere x300 mower well. It's actually bigger than needed, but that's not a bad thing. Easy to get on and covers the entire mower to the ground. Looks good too. Had a major rain storm last night and looks like it's keeping it dry, but not sure how it's going to hold up long-term. The top where it sits on the engine cover looked to be absorbing the water rather than shedding it so we'll see how it does. For now I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: David Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought new mower but had to increase doors to fit new mower on my shed. bought this cover to fit till shed could be fixed. Love this and I bought size up to be sure it fit but not to snug so wouldn't tear. Fits great and I would say buy a size up so it will be easy to put on. covers my tires also. elastic around bottom which really help. Really easy to put on or off. My mower was a 70Lx44Wx38H. so I bout the 77L and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Packard

customer_reviews.title: This is the cover everybody has been searching for.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about 3 months now. We have gone through some very heavy rain. It has kept the mower dry. Heavy construction material. I have the standard riding lawn mower a it covers it completely with room to spare. It is really big. But I would rather it big than to small. I have the cadet mower from Sears and it is better than their cover hand down. I will be buying covers from them now on. It has been a year now and it is doing great. This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made; should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the cover. I have a JD mower with a blower and grass catcher, and there is no fitted cover that will cover everything, but this cover fits beautifully over the mower itself and secures well. I like the quality feel, solid construction and vents. I did consider the JD branded cover, but this one has higher user satisfaction and it's clear that it's made extremely well. Bravo.
customer_reviews.author: whatareyoulookinat

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality cover. The reviews are accurate. This cover is well worth the price. In the past I've gotten maybe 2 or 3 seasons out of a cover before the become brittle and rip. I've only owned this one a month, but I'm pretty sure this one will last a long time. It's well worth the money. I'm going to buy another one for a different piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Waynomo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It is plenty big enough to cover my John Deere 42 inch deck lawn tractor. The elastic around the bottom keeps it in place in the windiest conditions. The material is flexible, waterproof, and very durable so far. I'll know better several months from now. As of now, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Bajorek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s soooooo nice to see such a quality product in this world of cheap junk. It’s heavy, fits my John Deere E-130 with room to spare, right to the ground. It even is big enough to cover the discharge chute. I hosed it hard after I put it on, and I can tell you that it is WATERPROOF, not just after a few drops like the big box store stuff, but after a half hour of hard hosing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover that completely covers 54” garden tractor
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the cover and it seems very nice! I ordered the large size for my 54” Craftsman garden tractor. Completely covers it with room to spare. The medium would have fit fine too I’m sure. Comes with a bonus storage bag. Definitely seems like a well made quality product. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gerard K.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, thick and well built cover
customer_reviews.text: Update; I had this cover for 2 years and 5 months. It finally got a hole naturally form in it. Its been sitting out in the open elements and sunshine this whole time. I am happy with how well it lasted. I have a 42 inch huskvarna mower. This cover was plenty big enough for it. It even covers the tires all the way tobthe ground. Very sturdy, thick and wekl built cover. Can't go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.author: Billy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect affordable cover for my 54" John Deere Mower
customer_reviews.text: For the price, much better than expected. This cover feels thick, has a waterproof coating with very substantial seams and elastic band on the bottom to keep it snug. It covers my 25 HP V-Twin Sabre by John Deere with room to spare, tires and 54" deck included. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: Durable Feeling Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use to cover my Husquvarna YTH20K46. More than enough to cover a 46" wide riding mower and it has already survived some hard Florida downpours. No water got in and kept the mower completely dry. I am very pleased with this product and expect it to last greater than a year.
customer_reviews.author: José J. Amador

customer_reviews.title: Will fit John Deere E130 mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my JD E130 and it fits great. My mower has a 42" cutting deck and there is plenty of room for bigger mowers. I like the green color as it's not nearly as hot as the black covers, and I dislike the color black, so that was also a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I have found durable and easy fit.
customer_reviews.text: The cover stay on just as left it we winds over 80 mph. from hurricane Sandy. Fits my John Deere lawn tractor 54" with room to spare. Easy to put on I'm 71 yr. old lady and had no problem with this cover. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Domogawa

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this cover the first time. I wouldn't have had to buy another one yet. The material is heavy and appears very durable. Water resistant and the vent keeps it from blowing off. I live on a huge lake and that makes for strong winds. This cover has stayed on so far through some good winds. It's the next best thing to being able to store you machine inside. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover - just bought another one.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my John Deer perfect. heavy duty and looks great, fast delivery and I am very happy - just got my second one today - this is made very well. got this one to cover my log splitter and it covers it perfect and is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: it's wonderful. Fully covers my mower and has repelled the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how to give you a review of this product - time will tell. So far, of course, being brand new, it's wonderful. Fully covers my mower and has repelled the rain. I bought a rather expenseive cover about 4 years ago which did fine until last winter; when I came home from a trip, I found it ripped down the middle. It was December and I think there was a lot of wind. So ask me again in about 3 years and I'll tell you how it held up. But so far, so good. Don't know if this helps or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rider Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is large enough to cover most medium and large riding mowers. I have only had this product for a couple of weeks; therefore, I need a few months to judge if a 5-star rating continues.
customer_reviews.author: Downeaster

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product from a family owned firm that understands customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a storage case and good instructions. It is not custom made for your equipment, but large enough and well designed to fit most large riding lawn tractors. Fits my garden tractor down over every part to the grass. Superior product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate straps to secure the product.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be used in an area where you have any wind. The straps used to secure the product are very inadequate
customer_reviews.author: Becky J

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell but so far appears to be a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seller requests for reviews come in far too early to actually give an accurate one, but it appears to be a quality material and it fits my cub cadet was a 46 inch deck fine. I like the muted green color as opposed to a harsher black. Cannot speak to water resistance or durability since I've had it a short time. So far, I would recommend you purchase. It arrived quickly and was well priced
customer_reviews.author: L Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cub Cadet LT1045 (46" Deck Tractor Mower) waiting on a carport extension in process, so ordered the large as rather too big than too small. Cover was everything expected from all great reviews to date (did my research) and did not disappoint. SE Texas known for its humidity, rain and wind (3 Hurricanes in my experience here so far: Rita, Ike & Harvey) so just trying to keep things dry and dust free. Very pleased & impressed, would recommend to anyone needing the same at a reasonable price. THANKS MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: VICKI L ADNEY

customer_reviews.title: Fit very well.
customer_reviews.text: I put on my mower to replace old wornout cover. This one fit great and is waterproof. Had big storm last night with heavy rain and high winds and it was still on this morning. Time will tell on durability.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. H

customer_reviews.title: Great material; high quality; really big!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is incredibly well made. I highly recommend it. Only issue for me is that it is huge (which is ironic, because I exchanged it for another brand because the other one was way too small). I did measure my lawn tractor, and it indicated that I would need the large size, but It is really big! Probably really needed the smaller one, but better too big than too small. Regardless, this cover is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Tibbrix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I now have 3 covers. So far each one is holding up to their heavy duty and water proof status. I had to order the larger size after discovering that this better covers the grass catcher. Perhaps if you could put a picture of a lawn mower with a grass catcher and tubes on the side that carry the debris to bags and stress that the larger cover would fit this better. No other issues than that. I would recommend this Company and products.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbumber

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these covers! Heavy, solid, high-quality. Bought one for our Husqvarna LGT2754 and one for our Craftsman DGT 6000 (54" and 48" decks respectively) I opted for the large size and there's room to spare on both. I would caution users to ensure that the mower is cooled off before covering though.
customer_reviews.author: Licensed Aquaculture Facility

customer_reviews.title: Great Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new Cub Cadet XT1 LT46" lawn tractor and am very pleased and impressed with it. Since receiving it, we have had a few very strong storms here in Missouri. Through all of the high winds and strong storms, this cover stayed right in place. I am very impressed and satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D. Shrimplin

customer_reviews.title: You need this cover
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality. It fits my riding mower perfectly. Its tough, it fits the whole mower including the seat all the way down to the wheels. I keep my riding mower outside so I'm worried about the damage it will get due to the weather, but since I have bought the Waterproof Riding Lawn Mower Cover I am no longer afraid and I know the cover will protect my mower. Absolute necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Persicketti

customer_reviews.title: Family Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: The Family Lawn Mower Cover is well made, and has a good weight to the fabric. I have bought other covers before, and this one is the best so far. I leave my mower outside, and I need a cover that can handle the Brutal Texas weather. This cover costs a little more, but it's built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Boyar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a Kubota 42" deck lawnmower with a back bagger. This cover the entire tractor with bagger, deck and tires. Very strong material with a vent on both sides to allow air to flow. It protected my lawnmower, and survived the relentless pounding from hurricane Florence. Very pleased well below the
customer_reviews.author: William Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover for Riding Lawnmower!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a waterproof cover that was long enough to fit our riding mower with a tank platform on the back. A great amount of width was not necessary and everything else seemed too bulky. The fabric is obviously durable and we like the side vents facing downward to ventilate and not get the mower wet. Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Mercer Wali

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Cover seems to be relatively well made, but the sizing is way off. The cover I received was supposed to fit a newer model lawn tractor with a 48" deck. My cover is much to large for my Husqvarna lawn tractor. Am in the process of attempting a return for a smaller cover.
customer_reviews.author: gaspatch

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This cover really did the job for me. It's light enough to be easily handled but sturdy enough to last. And it really holds on at the bottom after it's on. Hey, I was going to spend over $600 to build a more weather proof shelter for my new Snapper but this makes my old, sort of leaky, shelter acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Rich (Mike) Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: D100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the larger cover for my John Deere D100 and it fit fine. Probably could have used the smaller cover. With the larger cover I am able to put the cover under the wheels a bit to hold the cover in place and prevent from blowing around. Clips or a way to attach it to the mower would help to prevent it from blowing away in high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great tractor cover
customer_reviews.text: We've used this cover for our 26hp Husqvarna tractor several times, thus far, and it has more than exceeded our expectations. It has kept our Husky dry through 2 huge thunderstorms, with heavy, wind-driven rain. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased a good used Kusqvarna riding mower and needed a good cover for it since we don't have a building yet to store it. Saw this one and the reviews were very good so I purchased. We have had the cover now for a few weeks and it has withstood several rainstorms and some very windy conditions and has stayed on the mower. The cover is a good heavy duty material and the elastic really stays put around the mower. I love this cover!!! -- Laura
customer_reviews.author: Laura Phillips

customer_reviews.title: A good replacement cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover replaces the old cover (different brand) we had which gave in after many years of use. This cover was a bit bigger but it works. Material appears medium-light which makes it easy to handle. Hoping this will be just as durable (or better) as the last cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about the waterproof cover
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the waterproof cover. I like the fact that it came in a storage bag. I’m able to store the cover with no hassles. Basically, I’m able to fold the cover like a queen size fitted sheet, which is fairly easy. The color is great because it seems to conceal dirt. The material feels durable and soft to the touch (great material). Additionally, I like that the cover covers the entire mower. Last but not least, I liked that the product describe when ordering was what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than needed for single blade mower 30 inch
customer_reviews.text: Like the material, seems sturdy I will be able to do a better rating after it goes through this winter . The mower is outdoors year round . Hasn't rained since i purchased it .
customer_reviews.author: John S. Elms

customer_reviews.title: BEST RIDER COVER!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is well made, the quality is great! And this covered every bit of my 50 inch Cub Cadet including the entire deck and Shute....really!!! The Cub Cadet cover I bought was supposed to cover up to 54 inch deck and it would not even cover the tires entirely without covering the deck, and after all it covers it still snugs up at the bottom just right to hold it secure. So glad I found this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice quality tractor cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality tractor cover. I have a Husqvarna GT garden tractor with a fairly large front bumper, so I got the large size. Fits good lengthwise, a little loose on the sides, but it has really good elastic around the bottom to keep it on the tractor. The stitching looks awesome, much better material than my last cover, which only lasted 1 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Al E

customer_reviews.title: All of the Rate features
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for my mower. Yes I did read a lot of reviews and decided on this one, GREAT DECISION. I ordered a larger size because a lot of reviews indicated that the 42" was too small. I am well satisfied with the cover I selected. Rick
customer_reviews.author: crazy cajun

customer_reviews.title: Doing it's job so far
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cover for my John Deere S240 with bagger system. Read reviews and saw one that said if fits. It's a tight fit but does the job. Having a motif helps which way to fit it (motif on the front). Appears strong and durable. Will see how it holds up through a winter.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for my riding mower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large cover. It fits my 46" Husqvarna riding mower with room to spare. The material is heavy duty. The elastic holds the cover tight around the wheels and deck so now rain gets in. The breath flaps are a big plus too. They keep moisture from building up. This is a great cover. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tab2

customer_reviews.title: IT's BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Husqvarna YTA24v48, I got the larger size to be save.... Well it way big for my riding mower. Get the smaller if you own the YTA24V48, Its good quality so far , winter will tell. needed to use rope to cinch it shut
customer_reviews.author: Jesus for Bong Hits

customer_reviews.title: Family Accessories Riding Lawn Mower Cover!! High quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This riding mower cover is made to do just that! Cover!! It's a heavy water resistant fabric with a nice elastic edge all around the bottom. This cover fitted perfectly over my Craftsman 46" deck mower and easily covered it right down to the ground. It also features two vents to help moisture escape from the sides. Nicely made and well worth the purchase. Best regards, John
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass!!!! Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover!!! I bought one for my John Deere & one for my zero turn! Durable, heavy, waterproof can’t go wrong with these products deliver what they promise!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Very Good cover for my Husquvarna riding mower.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover my Husquvarna 42" mower and it does the job well. very durable and easy to put on. Mine is a bit baggy but that is my fault because I ordered the large instead of the regular size. has great vents and holds up to rain and wind with ease. I have owned for about 6 months now and still looks just as good as the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin  Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Covers well... good in wind and rain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my landlady’s 54” cut riding mower. Covers everything, even the grass chute guard. Been wind blown and rained on... so far so good! I’d buy it again if I needed one!
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for John Deere x330 with bagger
customer_reviews.text: Rain just beads up and runs off this waterproof cover. Large size is plenty big enough for my John Deere x330 with 42 inch deck and rear bagger accessory. Good elastic edge holds cover on even with wind, but easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Large size but received Medium size. Wanted to exchange but the only option was to return and get a refund. I am not confident that if I reorder that I will get a Large. Disappointed. Guess I'll just keep using an ugly blue tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Goetze

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a good quality Cover.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large 76x47x47 cover and this size fits our John Deere X300 with a 42" deck perfect. The tractor sits outside all winter and the cover has held up well. The material has faded a little, but otherwise in good shape after one year of Minnesota weather. If I could change one thing, I would add a draw string around the base to keep it tight. Some times the wind will get under the cover and lift it off the tractor.
customer_reviews.author: jpye

customer_reviews.title: Strong and dry
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned after reading some of the reviews. I have no idea what product they received. The one I got is waterproof, stays put, and is strong. I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room to spare.
customer_reviews.text: The cover appears well made and looks good. Ordered the large size which covered my Gravely Compact 44 easily, even with the discharge deflector installed. The medium would have been big enough. Arrived on-time. Been in use for almost 2 years. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: DAR.

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy material
customer_reviews.text: Good thick cover. Fits my John Deere E100 completely with room to spare. Elastic bottom has kept it on thru 4 severe thunderstorms so far this year. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty weather resistant and water proof quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and good fit for my Craftsman GT5000 with 48” mower deck and rear bagger.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Substantial
customer_reviews.text: Feels substantial, love that it's actually heavy cloth and not some of that plastic shite that some places will sell you with a smile on their face. Time will tell as to the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Has vents so humidity can escape an not rust out your lawn tractor
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is mostly water proof, the vents are a major selling point because without them humidity under the cover would rust the tractor out. The mostly water proof part is only because of the vents in a super nasty storm like we just had *50mph wind gusts* let water in. Not normal occurence by any means and just regular rains it does fantastic. I would highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Koziol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, made from high quality material!
customer_reviews.text: This lawn tractor cover fits perfect. Made of high quality material. It covers completely, deck, front bar bumper, everything and stays on tightly. We had heavy winds, it didn't budge! Very pleased with this. Had several in the past, so far, this is the best! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Schweigg

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my father and he absolutely loves it thank you
customer_reviews.author: rpprincess

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. The quality of the cover is great. The instructions to care for it and use it are easy to follow. We had our first rain yesterday so we were able to test it out. The mower is under our shed, but water still drips because the shed is old. The rain fell off the cover like water falls off a pair of water-proof pants (weird analogy?). It's pretty cool. It works!
customer_reviews.author: M_Lopez26

customer_reviews.title: Great quality has vents!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and thats coming from a construction contractor using tarps all the time. Unfortunately its bigger then you think. I have a yardman 54" deck, ordered a large which was too big Sending back and ordering next size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the xl for my cub cadet xt1 fits great with some room to spare. Had a little rain past couple days and it has stayed dry underneath. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VanN

customer_reviews.title: Nice well constructed product
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, solid product, fits like a glove. I have it over a Craftsmen T2600 mower.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky1769

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality than other covers.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a very durable, heavy cover. Fits over the whole tractor including the 54" mowing deck. Now the trick is to see how it does in direct sunlight over time. I spent more this time and got a better product.
customer_reviews.author: kenkre1212

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, size Large
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. I ordered a large. Which will easily cover a 100 series John Deere. I have a D130 with a 42 inch deck and it covered the entire mower with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cover. Make sure you measure your riding mower dimensions before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Who Me?

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I covered my zero turn mower which fit perfectly am very satisfied thus far. It did as promised. Also looks good.
customer_reviews.author: john m Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality riding mower cover.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover. Totally covers my mower. Even with bagger attached. Like the vents to keep condensation down. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Held Up During Hurricane Florence!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mower cover to replace a less expensive one I bought a year ago that had already began to split and leaving the mower wet during rain. We recently were affected by Hurricane Florence and while I do not live on the coast where there was so much devastation, we did receive quite a bit of rain. I uncovered my mower after Florence finally moved through and it was dry as a bone! I am anxious to see exactly how it holds up this winter, but so far it has been great!
customer_reviews.author: One Way

customer_reviews.title: Like not others I have purchased in the past
customer_reviews.text: Heavy strong build/material. Waiting to see how it will handle the Florida summer months. Additional review later after a few months of use. Update 2020 Amazing customer service. Experience a situation that may have been caused by how the product was being used and the company was able to resolve the problem quickly. Their follow up emails is amazing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write a review on this. Could not be more happier with this. Nice thickness and well made. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Don Stone

customer_reviews.title: DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: Works so well I bought one for my motorcycle as well, great price for the durability. As long as they keep selling it, I will continue to replace and buy this product, so far first cover has lasted over 3 years outside 100% of the time. It’s abit Faded but no rips tares and the elastic on the bottom is still 100% efficient. Amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: SWEETIE

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Great cover fits great, I only wish they could make a longer one like 110” long so we could cover the bags too on the tractor! I will purchase the longer one too if they make one!
customer_reviews.author: james c. nichols

customer_reviews.title: This cover FITS!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this lawn mower cover on our 42" deck mower right away. It fits over the tires and around the deck just as advertised. We have had plenty of rain and this cover really works! Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SciSpec1

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fits on John Deere (E170) mower well - even a little room to spare. Elastic on bottom edge holds cover to tractor well (so far in mild winds). Mostly I like the color and ease of use - on/off in < 30 s. Only had it a month or two, so I'll know about durability in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyvale

customer_reviews.title: Riding Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. The material is thicker than most with two vents. I bought the larger size. It fits my Sears 42" Craftsman ProSeries 27038 mower perfectly including the chute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping item as described!! Durable fits 46” mower perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my husband's new lawn mower. It arrived very quickly and the cover was exactly what he wanted. The quality of this cover is excellent thick material, very well made and it fits perfectly. We had rain the night after it arrived and I can say it is completely waterproof. Thanks for a great quality product. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Colvard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality cover and a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product quality and fit. I bought it for my John Deere x540 with a 48 inch deck and it fits like it was made for it. Very pleased and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Hollis

product_meta.title: Family Accessories Riding Lawn Mower Cover, 100% Waterproof Heavy Duty 600D Storage for Ride On Lawnmower Tractor, Large Size for 54+ Inch Decks, 76Lx47Wx47H
feature_bullets: 100% WATERPROOF - Beware of other covers claiming “water resistant”! This means they protect only partially and your mower engine will be wet after rain. Our cover has a thick PU rubber coating on the inside and a seam sealing that keep your lawn rider dry even in heavy rains. Two air vents prevent water condensation.

HEAVY DUTY - Serves x2 times longer! This is our premium product line made of better materials than a standard cover. Marine grade 600D fabric, double stitching and better UV protection ensure durability over time. The fabric stays flexible in winter and does not crack like cheap PVC fabrics.

EASY TO USE - Elastic hem assures a tight fit around a garden tractor so the cover won't fly-off during windy days and it is much easier to use than drawstring covers. Storage bag included. Universal size fits large tractors with a deck 50+ inches and measures 76"L x 47"W x 47"H. Check other sizes available for the best fit.

PROTECTS YOUR INVESTMENT - Keeps your riding lawn mower out of extreme elements (rain, dust, dirt, wind, sun, snow and birds). Perfect weatherproof outdoor storage for yard machine during summer or winter. Olive green color blends into the yard nicely.

100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - All our products come with a 1 month guarantee: if you experience ANY problems with your ride on lawnmower cover, we refund your entire purchase. Our products are sold with a 12 month warranty for the original purchaser against manufacturing defects.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars530 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
